primary.comment: The primary color is used to indicate primary actions, selected elements or as background color for app bars.

primary-variant.comment: The primary variant color is used for text and icons on a light background to ensure an accessible contrast ratio.

secondary.comment: The secondary color is used to indicate selection controls, floating actions or overline text.

tertiary.comment: The tertiary color is used to colorize information graphics.

quaternary.comment: The quaternary color is used to colorize information graphics.

background.comment: The background color is used for the content background.

surface.comment: The surface color is used as the background color for cards, text fields, sheets, dialogs, menus and chips.

outline.comment: The outline color is used for components with an outline like cards, text fields or buttons.

error.comment: The error color is used for error text.

success.comment: The success color is used for success text.

primary.comment: The primary contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the primary color.

primary-variant.comment: The primary variant contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the primary variant color.

secondary.comment: The secondary contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the secondary color.

tertiary.comment: The tertiary contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the tertiary color.

quaternary.comment: The quaternary contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the quaternary color.

background.comment: The background contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the background color.

surface.comment: The surface contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the surface color.

outline.comment: The outline contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the outline color.

error.comment: The error contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the error color.

success.comment: The error contrast color is used for elements like text that is displayed on a background with the success color.
